content: I think I'll use a combination of modern and simple labels, along with some food flags to add a decorative touch. I'll keep the labels short and concise, using the English names of the dishes, and add a brief description on the place cards to give my guests a little more information. Thanks for the suggestions! By the way, I made Japanese appetizers for the first course, and I'm excited to see how they'll pair with the Junmai sake.
